title: Help identifying this font
content:
Hi,

I was wondering if someone could help me identify this font used in AstraZeneca's logo. Thanks in advance.

oneman

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Astra Seneca.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130515234140/http:/typophile.com/files/Astra%20Seneca.gif) | 2.45 KB |
author: onemanstudio

comments.content: AstraZeneca looks very similar to Franklin Gothic and Vectora, but probably customised. The tagline looks like Helvetica.
